1 #include "twizy_webots/wheel_encoder.h"

3 #include <cmath>
4 #include <iostream>
5 #include <twizy_wheel_encoder/WheelEncoder.h>
6 #include <webots/utils/AnsiCodes.hpp>
7 
8 namespace twizy_webots {
9 
10 WheelEncoder::WheelEncoder(webots::Supervisor &supervisor, ros::NodeHandle &nh,
11  ros::NodeHandle &nh_private, std::string position)
12  : sensor_(supervisor.getPositionSensor(position + "_wheel_encoder")),
13  position_(position) {
14 
15  std::cout << "Initializing " << position << " wheel encoder\n";
16 
17  // Read required ROS parameters
18  double ups;
19  if (!nh.getParam("/physical/rear_wheel/radius", wheel_radius_) ||
20  !nh_private.getParam("wheel_encoder/cov", covariance_) ||
21  !nh_private.getParam("wheel_encoder/ups", ups)) {
22  std::cout << webots::AnsiCodes::RED_FOREGROUND
23  << "Required ROS parameters missing"
24  << webots::AnsiCodes::RESET << std::endl;
25  return;
26  }
27 
28  // Enable sensors
29  sensor_->enable(round(1000.0 / ups));
30 
31  publisher_ = nh.advertise<twizy_wheel_encoder::WheelEncoder>(
32  "/wheel/" + position + "/encoder", 1);
33 
34  update_timer_ =
35  nh.createTimer(ros::Duration(1.0 / ups), &WheelEncoder::update, this);
36 }
37 
38 void WheelEncoder::update(const ros::TimerEvent &evt) {
39  double position = sensor_->getValue();
40  // Webots will return NaNs at the beginning of the simulation, don't bother
41  // with those
42  if (std::isnan(position)) {
43  return;
44  }
45 
46  ros::Time stamp = ros::Time::now();
47  double time = stamp.toSec();
48 
49  // Speed is calculated by a simple first order approximation of the
50  // derivative of the wheel axis position. We need two position measurements
51  // to perform this calculations
52  if (time > last_time_ && last_time_ > 0) {
53  twizy_wheel_encoder::WheelEncoder enc;
54  enc.header.frame_id = "rear_" + position_ + "_wheel";
55  enc.header.stamp = stamp;
56  enc.speed = abs(wheel_radius_ * (position - last_position_) /
57  (time - last_time_));
58  enc.covariance = covariance_;
59  publisher_.publish(enc);
60  }
61 
62  last_position_ = position;
63  last_time_ = time;
64 }
65 
66 WheelEncoder::~WheelEncoder() { sensor_.reset(); }
67 
68 } // namespace twizy_webots
wheel_encoder.h
Simulation of an autonomous Twizy's arduino based wheel encoders.
